name: Trenchcoat
description:
[Local CO-OP recommended, but single player is possible. Chrome may require a refresh after loading the first level to fix a browser side input problem]

In a world dominated by grown ups, two underaged trouble makers must go undercover to outwit their oppressors. You and your teammate are getting down to some good old fashioned mischief and testing the trusty trenchcoat technique against guards barring you from places a kid is normally never allowed into – or out of!

Trenchcoat is a cooperative 2.5D stealth game developed for Brackey's Game Jam 2021.1. The game is the product of a collective effort by:

Tyler Zudans - Programming

Gwyn Buk and Thomas Perry - Art

David Israel - Soundtrack    https://soundcloud.com/david-israel-544357936

Zane Zudans - SFX

We hope you enjoy playing Trenchcoat!
